mapper.select: SELECT comm.COMMUNITY_ID, ca.CATEGORY, comm.COMMUNITY_TITLE, comm.COMMUNITY_CONTENT, comm.USER_ID FROM project_diet.community as comm INNER JOIN category as ca ON comm.CATEGORY_ID = ca.CATEGORY_ID WHERE ca.CATEGORY_ID LIKE 'C%' order by COMMUNITY_ID;

select COMMON_CODE_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, PARENT_COMMON_CODE_ID from commons_code where 1 = 1
and COMMON_CODE_ID like CONCAT(#{words}, '%')
and NAME like CONCAT(#{words}, '%')
and DESCRIPTION like CONCAT(#{words}, '%')
and PARENT_COMMON_CODE_ID like CONCAT(#{words}, '%')
